name: Sincere Deceit
storyline: In control of your Ancient puppet, the batter, the world you once purified has been taken over by a strange force that corrupts it beyond limits. Your job is to take care of it and save the lands, or else let them be consumed by said force. Only then can you know what is best for this decadent world.
summary:
Sincere Deceit is a fangame based on the indie title OFF by Mortis Ghost. You play as The Batter once more, dropped into a world slowly falling apart from a mysterious force corrupting it. It is your job to decide whether to fight against this force, or let it consume the world around you. Follow either of the two voices guiding you, or choose to cut your own path to find out the truth of what happened.

Sincere Deceit is a horror game at heart, and thus deals with many heavy topics, such as violence/cruelty, gore/body horror, suicide, cult indoctrination, jumpscares (both visual and audio based) and some flashing on the screen. This is not a game for the faint of heart.
